    • Method Detail

      • md5sum

        public java.lang.String md5sum(java.lang.String aFile)
        Get the md5sum of a file
        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        Returns:
        An md5sum of the file

      • stat

        public FileStat stat(java.lang.String aFile)
        Get information about a file or folder like size, type, symlink, mm, access, permissions, ownership etc
        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        Returns:
        A FileStat container with all of the file/folder information or NULL if no such file or folder exists

      • statList

        public java.util.ArrayList<FileStat> statList(java.lang.String aFile)
        See statList(String aFile, Integer aMaxLines)

      • statList

        public java.util.ArrayList<FileStat> statList(java.lang.String aFile,
                                     java.lang.Integer aMaxLines)
        Get a complete list of folder items.

        The method will return a FileStat container per each item in the folder

        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        aMaxLines - Max items to return. This also takes negative values to cut from the bottom
        Returns:
        An ArrayList with all FileStat items or NULL if no such folder exists

      • list

        public java.lang.String[] list(java.lang.String aFile)
        Get a complete list of folder items.

        This list only contains the names of the folder content. Use statList() for full stats

        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        Returns:
        An Array with all the folder content or NULL if no such folder exists

      • check

        public java.lang.Boolean check(java.lang.String aFile,
                      java.lang.String aType)
        Check the type of a file or folder or whether it exists or not
        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        aType - The type to check for ('d'=>Directory, 'f'=>File, 'b'=>Block Device, 'c'=>Character Device, 'l'=>Symbolic Link, 'e'=>Exists)
        Returns:
        True if the type matches

      • copy

        public java.lang.Boolean copy(java.lang.String aSrcFile,
                     java.lang.String aDstFile)
        Copy a file or folder to another location
        Parameters:
        aSrcFile - Full path to the file
        aDstFile - Full path to the destination
        Returns:
        True if it copied successfully

      • copyResource

        public java.lang.Boolean copyResource(Context aContext,
                             java.lang.Integer aResourceId,
                             java.lang.String aDestination)
        See copyResource(Context aContext, Integer aResourceId, String aDestination, String aPermission, String aUser, String aGroup)

      • copyResource

        public java.lang.Boolean copyResource(Context aContext,
                             java.lang.Integer aResourceId,
                             java.lang.String aDestination,
                             java.lang.String aPermission,
                             java.lang.String aUser,
                             java.lang.String aGroup)
        Copy a file from application resources into the file system on the device
        Parameters:
        aContext - The Application or Activity context
        aResourceId - The resource id for the file
        aDestination - Full destination path including the new file name
        aPermission - Permissions to set after copy
        aUser - User name or user id to set the ownership after copy
        aGroup - Group name or group id to set the ownership after copy
        Returns:
        True if it copied successfully

        aSrcFile - Full path to the file
        aDstFile - Full path to the destination
        Returns:
        True if it copied successfully

      • clear

        public java.lang.Boolean clear(java.lang.String aFile)
        Remove all content from a file or folder

        Note that this does not delete the file or folder, it just removes all content

        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        Returns:
        True if it cleared successfully

      • realPath

        public java.lang.String realPath(java.lang.String aFile)
        Convert a path into a real path.

        This could either be a link which would return the path to the real item or something line ../file which would be converted into /file

        Parameters:
        aFile - Path to the file
        Returns:
        The complete path to the real item or NULL on failure

                         java.lang.String aGroup,
                         java.lang.Boolean aRecursive)
        Change the ownership on a file or folder
        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        aUser - User Name or ID
        aGroup - Group Name or ID
        aRecursive - Change folders recursively
        Returns:
        True if it was changed successfully

                              java.lang.String aPermission,
                              java.lang.Boolean aRecursive)
        Change the permissions on a file or folder
        Parameters:
        aFile - Full path to the file
        aPermission - Permission string like (0755)
        aRecursive - Change folders recursively
        Returns:
        True if it was changed successfully
